content: I watched a movie the other nite the name of it slips my mind ..something Jane about a lady that wanted to be a seal and went thru thier training, Well One part of thier training that I remember very well was " Water Boarding " We can do it to our people and call it training and in our colleges and call it initiation but when we do it to a " Terrorist Murdering SOB " it is called torture????? What the He!! is going on in our country they cut off Americans Heads on TV and no one says hardly anything . I may be wrong in my thinking but I believe we have not commited "torture" by comparison. SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA

title: Speaking of Torture..

content: Ron! Finally someone with common sense. It's called GI-Jane. The Waterboarding is popular on college campuses. A fellow member here has undergone waterboarding. Guess what? I could care less about KSM! I do care, however, for US Citizens. The new Mantra 'but we are better than them'. LOL!! This is NOT a popularity contest. It is War. And Global War on Terror. Saved some lives by dunking KSM, AMERICAN Lives. Why complain about that? HUH! So KSM was 'uncomfortable'. Big deal. CHECK this site out "http://www.truthtube.tv/index.php" WARNING! Graphic Content. Hit the Home Tab for more.
